description:
The interview was recorded on May 2, 2004 with Zaynah Ṣāliḥ, female, born in 1921? in Maʻlūl, Palestine.

السيرة: سجلت المقابلة مع زينب صالح في 2 أيار مايو عام 2004، أنثى، ولدت عام 1921؟ في معلول، فلسطين.
contents: Childhood and everyday life. (@ 0:00)||Agricultural life in Maʻlūl. (@ 8:27)||Social and community life in the village. (@ 13:37)||Political turmoil and popular resistance. (@ 31:46)||War time, displacement and exile. (@ 41:39)||Military occupation and exile . (@ 50:14)||Refugee life in Lebanon. (@ 61:15)
